embedSender.title: Embed Sender
embedSender.description: Create embeds like Discohook: configure on the left, preview on the right. Save up to 5 embeds per server.

dashboard.noServers: You don't have any servers yet. Please log in with Discord to see your servers.

ranks.title: Team Ranks
ranks.name: Rank Name
ranks.roleHelp: Select the Discord role to use for this rank. Only these roles will trigger notifications.
ranks.noRolesAvailable: No roles available. Make sure the bot has access to roles.

members.title: Team Members
members.confirmRemove: Do you really want to remove this member?
members.confirmRemoveRights: Do you really want to remove all team rights from this member? The default role will be assigned and the member will be removed from the team.
members.announcementWarning: Note: An announcement will be sent in the configured notification channel once the role is assigned.
members.selectRanksToRemove: Please select at least one rank to remove.
members.noRanksOwned: This member does not own any team ranks that could be removed.

templates.title: Announcement Templates
templates.name: Template Name
templates.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete this template?

config.title: Configuration
config.defaultRoleHelp: Role that will be assigned when all team rights are removed from a member. All team roles will be removed and this role will be added.
config.teamListChannelHelp: Channel where the team list is automatically updated. The list is updated on every join, leave, upgrade or downgrade.

factionManagement.title: Faction Management
factionManagement.description: Configure channels and embed texts for faction creation/join, warning, dissolution, and overview. The faction list is refreshed automatically after each command.

channels.title: Channels
channels.hint: Select the channel where embeds are posted. Only text and announcement channels are shown (no categories).

warnDuration.label: Warn duration (days)
warnDuration.hint: After this many days a warn is automatically removed (2‚Üí1, 1‚Üí0).

embeds.title: Embed texts
embeds.placeholders: Placeholders are replaced with actual values when the embed is sent.
embeds.placeholdersCreateWarnDissolve: Available: {faction_name} = faction name, {announcement_text} = announcement text from the modal
embeds.placeholdersOverview: Available: {faction_list} = formatted list of all factions (e.g. "‚Ä¢ Faction A" + newline + "‚Ä¢ Faction B")
embeds.overviewDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g. {faction_list} or your own text with {faction_list}

factionsList.title: Current factions
factionsList.hint: Factions are managed via Discord commands (/faction add, /faction remove). The list updates after each command.

serverManagement.title: Settings
serverManagement.languageDescription: Choose the language for this server. This setting affects the language of bot messages and the dashboard.
serverManagement.timezoneDescription: Choose the timezone for this server. This setting will be used for all timestamps and dates.

timezones.UTC+1_Berlin: UTC+1 (CET/CEST) - Central Europe (Germany, Austria, Switzerland, France, Italy, Spain, etc.)
timezones.UTC+2_Athens: UTC+2 (EET/EEST) - Eastern Europe (Greece, Finland, Romania, etc.)

statistics.title: Statistics Channel
statistics.description: One voice channel per statistic (not joinable). The channel name shows the current value (e.g. "üë• Members: 123"). After saving, the bot creates or removes the channels automatically.
statistics.channelNamesPerStatHint: Display name for each statistics channel (e.g. "Members" ‚Üí "üë• Members: 42"). Empty = default.
statistics.intervalHint: At least 5 min recommended (Discord guidelines). After saving, the bot will create or remove the channels automatically.

botPersonalization.title: Bot Personalization
botPersonalization.description: Personalize your Discord bot's appearance. Change name, avatar, and banner.
botPersonalization.botNameHelp: The nickname displayed for the bot only on this server (max. 32 characters). Leave empty to use the global bot name.
botPersonalization.avatarHelp: Upload an avatar for the bot (max. 8MB, PNG/JPG/GIF). This will only be displayed on this server.
botPersonalization.bannerHelp: Upload a banner for the bot (max. 8MB, PNG/JPG/GIF). This will only be displayed on this server.

deleteMessages.title: Delete Messages
deleteMessages.description: Delete messages in a channel by count or time period
deleteMessages.modeAllHint: Deletes all messages in the channel once (performant via bulk delete). Messages older than 14 days are deleted individually.
deleteMessages.confirmDeleteAll: Do you really want to delete ALL messages in this channel? This action cannot be undone.
deleteMessages.countHelp: The last X messages will be deleted
deleteMessages.timeHelp: All messages in the last X hours/minutes will be deleted
deleteMessages.sendNotificationHelp: Send an embed message after deletion
deleteMessages.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete {count} messages?
deleteMessages.confirmDeleteTime: Do you really want to delete all messages in the last {time}?

autoDelete.title: Automatic Deletions
autoDelete.description: Automatically delete messages at regular intervals
autoDelete.intervalHelp: How often should messages be deleted? (Minimum 5 minutes)
autoDelete.deleteAllInfo: ‚ö†Ô∏è All messages in the channel will be deleted. Messages older than 14 days will be deleted individually.
autoDelete.warningDescription: With automatic deletion, ALL messages in the selected channel will be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Please make sure you really want to delete all messages in this channel.
autoDelete.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete this automatic deletion?

closeConfig.title: Ticket Closing
closeConfig.description: Configure the message and behavior when closing tickets
closeConfig.requireConfirmationHelp: If enabled, a confirmation will be shown after clicking 'Close Ticket' before the ticket is actually closed.
closeConfig.useCustomMessageHelp: If enabled, a custom message will be used when closing. If disabled, the default message will be used.
closeConfig.confirmationButtonTextHelp: The text displayed on the confirmation button (max. 80 characters)
closeConfig.previewPlaceholder: No custom message entered. The default message will be used.

welcomeSection.title: Welcome
welcomeSection.description: Automatically send a message when someone joins the server
welcomeSection.clickOrDrag: Click here or drag an image here
welcomeSection.noChannels: No channels found. Please make sure the bot has access to the channels.
welcomeSection.fileTooLarge: The file is too large. Please choose an image under 5MB.

embedEditor.authorHidden: Author hidden ‚Äì click the eye to show

reactionRoles.embedBannerDescription: Banner is displayed at the top of the embed (max. height: 128px)
reactionRoles.label: Label (optional)
reactionRoles.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete this reaction role?
reactionRoles.confirmResend: Do you want to resend this message? The old message will not be deleted.

badWords.title: Bad Words Filter
badWords.description: Automatically delete messages with unwanted words

whitelistRoles.title: Whitelist Roles
whitelistRoles.description: Roles that can still post (e.g. moderators)

leveling.title: Leveling
leveling.description: Give your members XP and levels when they send messages, and rank them by activity

xpRate.title: XP Rate
xpRate.description: Change the difficulty of leveling up by adjusting how fast your members gain XP.
xpRate.cooldownDescription: Time that must pass between two XP awards

roleRewards.title: Role Rewards
roleRewards.stackDescription: Users can receive multiple rewards at once
roleRewards.replaceDescription: Users only receive the highest role reward
roleRewards.removeOnXpLoss: Remove role reward after member lost XP
roleRewards.description: Role rewards are roles that a player automatically receives when they reach a certain level. You can stack them or only keep the highest role reward.

excludedRoles.title: Roles Excluded from XP
excludedRoles.description: You can set roles here that prevent users from receiving XP.
excludedRoles.allowAllExcept: Allow all roles to receive XP, except
excludedRoles.denyAllExcept: Deny all roles from receiving XP, except

excludedChannels.title: Channels Excluded from XP
excludedChannels.description: You can also prevent your members from receiving XP when they send messages in certain text channels.

rankCard.title: Default Server Rank Card
rankCard.description: You can customize the default /rank card on your server. By default, every member of your server has this rank card.

landing.heroTitle: The Best All-In-One Discord Bot for Your Community.
landing.heroDescription: XBot is a Complete Discord Moderation Bot for your Community. Constantly expanding based on community requests and Completely Free.

legal.cookieBannerNecessaryOnly: This site uses only necessary cookies (session, XSRF) for login and secure use. No marketing or tracking cookies are used.
legal.privacyContent:
I. Information about us as controller
The data controller under Art. 4(7) GDPR is the provider stated in our Imprint.

II. Rights of users and data subjects
Right of access (Art. 15 GDPR): You may request access to your personal data we process.
Right to rectification (Art. 16 GDPR): You may request correction or completion of your stored data.
Right to erasure (Art. 17 GDPR): You may request erasure of your personal data, unless processing is necessary for other reasons set out in Art. 17 GDPR.
Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR): You may request restriction of processing of your personal data.
Right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR): You may request to receive your data in a structured, commonly used format or its transmission to another controller.
Right to lodge a complaint (Art. 77 GDPR): You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.

III. Right to object (Art. 21 GDPR)
You have the right to object, on grounds relating to your particular situation, to processing of your personal data based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR.

IV. Information on data processing
Hosting: When you access our website, data (e.g. IP address, date/time, page accessed) may be temporarily stored in server logs. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. Storage is for provision and security of the website.
Cookies: We use only technically necessary cookies (session, XSRF token). Legal basis: ¬ß 25(2) No. 2 TTDSG and Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. See Cookie Notice for details.
Discord OAuth (login): When you log in via Discord we receive and store: Discord user ID, display name, email address, avatar URL, and the list of servers (guilds) you belong to. Purpose: authentication and association of your servers in the dashboard. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR and your consent with Discord.
Dashboard: All settings you configure per server (welcome/goodbye, tickets, giveaways, birthdays, leveling, reaction roles, auto-moderation, delete messages, team/faction management, statistics, saved embeds, etc.) are stored on our servers. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(b), (f) GDPR.
Use of XBot within Discord: On servers using XBot, the bot processes message and member data only as necessary for the chosen features (e.g. level XP, tickets, moderation, factions). Processing is based on Discord's terms and your use of the bot. Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(b), (f) GDPR. Data is stored in our database; disclosure to third parties is only where technically necessary (hosting, Discord). We do not sell your data.
Retention: Personal data is deleted when no longer necessary. Session data ends on logout. You can influence the link to your data via logout or account deletion.
Discord: Discord processes data as an independent controller. Information on Discord's processing: https://discord.com/privacy.
legal.imprintContent:
Information according to ¬ß 5 TMG / ¬ß 18 MStV

XBot / [Legal name of provider]
[Street, number]
[Postal code and city]
[Country]

Represented by:
[Name of responsible person(s)]

Contact:
Phone: [Optional]
Email: [Your email]

Responsible for editorial content under ¬ß 18(2) MStV:
[Name and address]
Email: [Content contact]

Scope of this imprint
This imprint applies to the websites and services of XBot (dashboard, bot invite, and all related subdomains). Use of the Discord bot XBot is also subject to Discord's terms and policies (discord.com).

Note: Please replace all placeholders in square brackets with your actual details. A complete imprint is legally required in Germany and the EU.
legal.cookiesContent:
We use only technically necessary cookies:

‚Äì Session cookie: Stores your session ID so you stay logged in after Discord login. The dashboard cannot be used without this cookie.
‚Äì XSRF token cookie: Protects against cross-site request forgery and is required for form security.

These cookies are necessary for the operation of the website (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR and ¬ß 25(2) No. 2 TTDSG). We do not use marketing or tracking cookies. You can set your browser to reject cookies; in that case use of the dashboard may be limited or impossible.
legal.termsContent:
Preamble
These terms apply to the relationship between the provider stated in our Imprint ("we"/"us") and the user ("you") of the Discord bot "XBot" and the associated dashboard. Conflicting terms of the user are not accepted. The law of the Federal Republic of Germany applies. The contract language is German. Personal data is processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy. To fully understand these terms you should also read Discord's terms (discord.com/terms).

Contact
The provider can be reached at the email address given in the Imprint and, where applicable, via support on our Discord server.

Services
We provide a Discord bot ("XBot") and a web dashboard to configure the bot on your Discord servers. Use requires inviting the bot to a server and logging in to the dashboard (e.g. via Discord). Availability depends on Discord's services; we do not guarantee uninterrupted availability but aim for reliable operation.

User obligations and conduct
You agree to use the bot and dashboard only lawfully and to comply with Discord's terms and community guidelines. In particular the following are prohibited: violations of Discord's guidelines in connection with the bot; advertising or spam via the bot; misrepresenting the bot's identity; misuse of APIs or automated scraping of our services; distribution of illegal or Discord-policy-violating content. We may restrict access if violations become known.

Third parties
Our services rely on the Discord platform. Discord's terms and privacy policy apply to use of Discord. We are not responsible for data processed by Discord.

Liability
Liability is limited to intent and gross negligence where permitted by law. We are not responsible for content that users distribute via the bot or dashboard.

Changes
We reserve the right to update these terms. You will be informed of material changes via the website or support. Continued use after changes take effect constitutes acceptance.

Final provisions
The law of the Federal Republic of Germany applies. The validity of individual clauses is unaffected if others are invalid.
